page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: {The following are types of employment} that occupy the people of Brockworth and parts of Shurdington: Bank Clerk Shop Assistant Factory Worker Veterinary Surgeon Doctor Farmer Post Office Clerk, Garage attendant Publican/Barmaid, School Teacher Welfare Assistant, Home Help Librarian Vicar Builder Turf Accountant Taxi Driver Driving Instructor Policeman Policewoman Gardener Caretaker Canteen Assistant, Secretary {Analysis of Distance Travelled to Work ( Sample of 200 families having children of junior school age.) Working in Brockworth - 36% Working up to 5 miles away - 36% Working 6 to 10 miles away - 11.5% Working over 10 miles away - 16.5%
